about_the_game:
Morgenstern is a single and multiplayer rogue lite hack and slay adventure with extraction mechanics created by a team which served previously as 'Manhunt 2' Lead Animator, 'No Rest For The Wicked' Producer and 'Split Second' Destruction Artists.

GAMEPLAY

In "Morgenstern," you'll delve into hand crafted levels and procedurally generated dungeons slaying dangerous foes and valuable treasures. The extraction mechanic requires you to strategically decide when to push forward and when to retreat, adding a layer of tactical depth to the rogue-like experience.

DESTRUCTION

The fully destructible world allows you to gather resources, set traps, and forge new paths, making each run a unique adventure.

PROGRESSION AND CUSTOMIZATION

Level up by completing contracts and earning reputation. Unlock new weapons, spells, and abilities to enhance your character. Craft weapons and spells to customize your build suiting your preferred playstyle, whether it's a powerful mage, a swift rogue, or a resilient warrior.

MULTIPLAYER EXPERIENCE

Join forces with friends in cooperative mode, or test your skills against other players in intense PvP battles. The game's PvE mode offers challenging encounters against AI enemies, perfect for honing your skills and gathering resources.

LAST CHANCE

When facing imminent defeat, spawn as a deadly pig, granting you one last chance to overcome your enemies and escape with your loot. This unique mechanic adds an exciting twist to the gameplay, ensuring that no run is ever truly over until the very end.

JOIN THE ADVENTURE NOW!

Are you ready to inscribe your saga in the chronicles of legend? Download "Morgenstern" now and embark on an epic medieval journey like no other.

Blood:
Depictions of blood.

Strong Language:
Profanity and explicit references to sexuality, violence, alcohol or drug use.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel I5 4690 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / RX 480 (4GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 8700K / AMD r5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060 Super / RX 5700 XT (8GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a medieval rogue-like journey, merging Survivor's hack-and-slay with souls-like rigor, in a third-person epic. Navigate dungeons, extract strategically, and inscribe your saga in the chronicles of legend.
